message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll love it, and I'm confident it will bring you a lot of value. I'm willing to start with a price of $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for it. Can we meet in the middle?

I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $11500 for the product. Can we discuss further?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I understand you're really trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $10500 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
